products.title: London Pride
products.description: Thi, tawny-coloured premium ale borrows sweet raisin, biscuit and dried-fruit notes from the Crystal malt, while fresh, piney herbs emanate from the hops.

products.title: Black Cab
products.description: Black Cab pours a near jet-black colour with hints of coffee, chocolate and roasted malts on the nose.

products.title: Griffin Gold
products.description: This refreshing golden ale is one that will tingle your taste buds and make you come back for more.

products.title: Honey Brew
products.description: Brewed to 5% ABV, Organic Honey Dew imparts gentle honey sweetness both on the nose and the palate.

products.title: Golden Pride
products.description: There's sweet orange oil, toasted grain and spicy fruit cake flavours on the tongue, and an intense, lasting finish.

products.title: Beavertown Neck Oil
products.description: It is crammed full of hops that are added a different times during the brew to bring out their individual flavours while reducing the bitterness.

products.title: Beavertown Gamma Ray
products.description: Fruity, zesty and floral, every kind of hop aroma is there, dominated by the tropical fruit and citrus.

products.title: Bottle Conditioned Ale
products.description: Those fruity characteristics harmonise perfectly with the biscuity malts amid a clever and complex range of subtle flavours, the depth of which you could only find in a live beer fermented in the bottle.

products.title: Bengal Lancer
products.description: On the palate, orange, character is followed by floral and spicy notes from the hops â€“ riding through to a satisfying finish of mild bitterness.

products.title: London Porter
products.description: The blend of Brown, Crystal and Chocolate malts provide earthy character and creamy delivery, while hints of coffee and chocolate carry through onto the tongue.
